data_structures: 2D array (prefix sums for factors of 2 and 5)
algorithm_technique: Prefix sums to efficiently calculate factor counts for paths.
Iterate through all possible turn points and calculate path sums.
problem_summary_simple: Find the path with at most one turn that maximizes trailing zeros in its product.
problem_summary_technical: Uses 2D prefix sums of prime factors (2 and 5) to calculate path products and find max trailing zeros.
key_insights: Trailing zeros are determined by the minimum count of factors 2 and 5.
Prefix sums are essential for O(1) calculation of factor counts in subgrids.
Consider all four types of cornered paths (up-right, up-left, down-right, down-left).
